diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Diverticulitis with perforation and stricture and abscess
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with symptoms of pelvic pain, diarrhea, and a known history of sigmoid stricture and recurrent abscess, which led to the diagnosis of diverticulitis with perforation. Radiologic findings indicated possible small bowel obstruction, and the patient had an associated pelvic abscess, supporting the diagnosis.
